description: The function is vulnerable to Path Traversal (CWE-22) as it uses user-supplied input in file paths without proper validation or sanitization. It is also vulnerable to OS Command Injection (CWE-78) as it uses user-supplied input in OS commands. Code Injection (CWE-94) is possible as the function uses user-supplied input in code that is later executed. The function also exposes sensitive information (CWE-200) as it prints out potentially sensitive data to the console.
